import random
width = random.randint(3, 13)
height = random.randint(3, 13)

RUR.set_world_size(width, height)
RUR.fill_background("water")
#bottom row
for x in range(1, width+1):
    RUR.add_background_tile("grass", x, 1)
#right column
for y in range(1, height+1):
    RUR.add_background_tile("grass", width, y)
#top row
for x in range(width, 0, -1):
    RUR.add_background_tile("grass", x, height)
#left column
for y in range(height, 0, -1):
    RUR.add_background_tile("grass", 1, y)

_path_followed = []

def move():
    r = default_robot()
    RUR._move_()
    _path_followed.append((r.body.x, r.body.y))
